colorBoard.title: ColorBoard
colorBoard.description: A webapp that turns pictures of your handwrritten code into text and compiles it for you

html.text: An idea emerged back in the 20th century about a brand new mode of transport involving a magnetic pad to reduce friction. In 2012, when California was all about the California High-Speed Rail project, Elon Musk suggested Hyperloop. We want to show few cases for Hyperloop, which we made in the begining of 2018. So this interface is totally unique, with its own functionality and usability.

thrive.title: Thrive
thrive.description: An all-in-one android app that provides voice translations, translates objects in photos and compiles all the resources immigrants would need.

student-calc.title: Student Budget Calculator
student-calc.description: A project I worked on at TD Labs. A web app that helps students add up all their costs for school.
